 (Array)subviews, View

 next_view_id, LayerCake
X
 x, Point

 y, Point
this.subviews
An array of child views of the current view
this.clickable
If clickable is false, the view click delegate will not trigger.
this.draggable
If draggable is false, the view cannot be dragged.
this.isDragging
Returns true if the current view is being dragged.
this.isMouseDown
Returns true if mousedown and not mouseup has been called on the current view.
this.isRoot
Returns true if the current view is the rootview.
this.visible
If visible is false, the view and all its subviews will not be drawn.
this.ctx
A reference to the 2D context of the canvas object
this.canvas
A reference to the DOM canvas element.
this.id
An auto_incremented id
this.bounds
The width and height of the view accessed by bounds.width and bounds.height
this.origin
The origin coordinate of the view
this.rootview
A reference to the rootview
this.superview
A reference to the parent view of the current view
next_view_id : 0 }
An auto_increment variable for all views
this.x
The x coordinate of the point
this.y
The y coordinate of the point
